alert.note: Alert for Baltimore; Carroll; Frederick; Howard; Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 6:31PM EDT until July 28 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND...HOWARD AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND...SOUTHEASTERN FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND AND WEST CENTRAL BALTIMORE COUNTIES IN NORTHERN MARYLAND... At 631 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Damascus, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Germantown, Rockville, Gaithersburg, Olney, Damascus, Lowes Island, Poolesville, Historic Ellicott City, Ellicott City, Aspen Hill, Potomac, North Bethesda, Woodlawn, Randallstown, Montgomery Village, Eldersburg, Milford Mill, North Potomac and Redland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Sterling Virginia. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
